definition: to slander/to defame/to misrepresent/to speak maliciously

sentences.english: Fear God only and forgive your false accusers.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏神只原諒對你的讒言。

sentences.english: Every flatterer lives at the expense of those who listen to him.
sentences.chinese: 阿輿奉承的人是靠聽信讒言的人活命的。

sentences.english: Why cannot the Ear be closed to its own destruction?
sentences.chinese: 爲何那耳朵不能避聽讒言？

sentences.chinese: 雖然是親戚的企業，但我不想搞特殊而招引來讒言。

definition: strict law/cruel punishment/to carry out cruel law rigorously
